title: Getting bots in ranked?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Why does everyone I play with suck in ranked? They have to be bots? My mmr isnt trash but yet im getting people who never played the game before and run it down? Can someone please help me? I can go back 100 games and tell who fed because its never my fault? I think riot made me only play with bots so?

replies.body: The best way to get rid of bots is to report them for botting in the post-game lobby! Was there anyone specific you were thinking might have botted?
